sentences.en: There have been repeated calls to reinstate the death penalty.
sentences.cn: 不断有人呼吁恢复死刑。

sentences.en: She says the public response was a factor in the decision to reinstate the grant.
sentences.cn: 她说公众的反应是决定恢复补助金的一个因素。

sentences.en: The governor is said to have agreed to reinstate five senior workers who were dismissed.
sentences.cn: 据说州长已经同意让被解雇的5位高级工人复职。
